contents.newMember:
Hello {{member.honorific}} {{member.lastName}}! I’m {{user.firstName}} from Laguna! We work with {{org.name}} Clinic, who sponsors our program. Thank you for signing up to participate! I'm here for you on the good days and the not-so-good days during your recovery. I’m looking forward to meeting you! To schedule a visit with me, click here:
{{downloadLink}}
contents.newControlMember: Thank you for joining the Laguna study!
contents.newMemberNudge:
Hello {{member.honorific}} {{member.lastName}}, I'm {{user.firstName}} from Laguna Health. Friendly reminder to download the app and schedule your first check-in:
{{downloadLink}}.
contents.newRegisteredMember: Welcome to Laguna Health. To get started on your recovery journey schedule a check-in with your Laguna coach here.
contents.newRegisteredMemberNudge: Friendly reminder from {{user.firstName}} at Laguna Health. I'm looking forward to supporting you on your recovery journey. To get started schedule your first check-in here.
contents.appointmentScheduledMember: Hello {{member.honorific}} {{member.lastName}}, your appointment with {{user.firstName}}, your Laguna Health coach is scheduled for {{appointmentTime}}.
contents.appointmentLongReminder: Reminder for {{member.honorific}} {{member.lastName}}'s appointment on {{appointmentTime}} with {{user.firstName}}, your Laguna Health coach.
contents.appointmentReminder: Hello{{member.honorific}} {{member.lastName}}, this is {{user.firstName}}. Our meeting will start in {{gapMinutes}} minutes
contents.appointmentRequest: Hello{{member.honorific}} {{member.lastName}}, It's {{user.firstName}} from Laguna. You can click below to schedule our next meeting.
contents.newChatMessageFromUser: Your coach, {{user.firstName}}, sent you a new message.
contents.logReminder: Track your recovery progress, and share it with your your coach.
contents.newChatMessageFromMember: You have one new message from your member, {{member.honorific}} {{member.lastName}}.
contents.appointmentScheduledUser: Hello {{user.firstName}}, an appointment has been added to your schedule on {{appointmentTime}}.
contents.memberNotFeelingWellMessage: Your member, {{member.honorific}} {{member.lastName}}, logged a score that requires your attention.
